name: Verify scans are returned correctly for a valid chatbot ID -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch scans for chatbot ID "89ebd370-38bb-43e5-9956-5c8cda370b9c"
When the user receives the scans response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for successful scans retrieval
And the response should contain a list of scans
And each scan should contain a valid "scan_id" of length 36
And each scan should contain a "creation_timestamp" in ISO 8601 format
And each scan should have a "status" equal to "REPORT_GENERATED"

fullName: Get Scans by Chatbot ID using Genr3d API: Verify scans are returned correctly for a valid chatbot ID

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Get Scans by Chatbot ID using Genr3d API

titlePath: Get Scans by Chatbot ID using Genr3d API
